name: Get Off My Lawn - Scuffed Games
name_original: Get Off My Lawn - Scuffed Games
description:
Welcome to the world of Scufftopia! 

The Spider King has gone mad! He wants to take over Professor Fumblerichards land! Can you help him defeat his menacing and incredibly creepy fate? Or will you perish in the land of the bugs?

How to Play:

Once you spawn into the game you need to fortify your land to protect your garden gate from being destroyed by the evil bugs of the forest! 

You can do this by collecting seeds from fallen bugs. 

Press 'E' to open the plant menu and right click to place a plant. 

Once it's grown, it'll attack any bug within it's range. Experiment with different plants to create a synergy that will defend your garden. 

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Right Click out of Build Mode to Fire

E - Select Plant and Enter Build Mode

Right Click in Build Mode - Place Plant
